title: I'm gonna need a bigger desk! 4K HP Envy All-in-One Unboxing
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine and today we are unboxing the HP Envy all-in-one. And the box is actually too large to put on the table so it's right here. A huge thank you to HP and Intel were partnering with me on this video. Let's get into the unboxing. Oh boy! Oh boy! This display is huge, it's 31.5 inches and it is 4K, which is super exciting. (cardboard scraps) (mellow music) (boxes thump on table) (polystyrene scraps on cardboard) Look at that! Ooh! Hey, can you just let me be like? (upbeat music) Wow. Okay, the box was huge. This display is huge. It has a built in speaker. And the thing I'm most excited to try out, is this little bottom mount right here. You guys, it's a wireless charger. Brilliant! (plastic crinkles) Okay, this is still. (laughs) It's still taking up the whole desk, it's so huge. I'm gonna put it on this little side table and see how that works out. While I unbox the rest of these accessories. (mellow music) (cardboard scratching on desk) Ach, I love when batteries are included. Oh yeah! Oh that's prefect. I love this so much because when I'm doing live Streams and stuff, I like to actually have the chat on my phone. (plastic crinkles) We've got our mouse. Also Bluetooth. I do like, that this has batteries, you can also get rechargeable ones, if you like. But I do like that this doesn't have any cables. You don't have to charge it, you can use it just like this, no cables, no nothing. This is fantastic. In you go. (plastic clicks) Well that's it. (mouse slides on desk and keys clack) (fingers click on mouse) I'm doing business. (keys continue to clack) Hey, Justine, what are you doing? Business! We're got one more box. (box slides across desk) (cardboard scraps and plastic crinkles) Oh this is, this beefy power adapter. (plastic crinkles) Oh! Has memory card reader. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you! Let's get this thing set up and talk about some specs. This features 32GB of RAM, 1TB solo stage hive and NVIDIA GeForce, GGX 16 50 graphics card. It has a 10th Gen intel Core i7, 2.9GHz processor. That redefines what's possible in a thin and light computer. SSD is with intel obtain memory deliver the best real world performance compared to non-SSDs. It has easy access to the ports. A built in powerful Bang & Olufsen speaker and wireless charging. There's a pop up privacy camera, it's 19 20P, with an 88 degree wide angle field of view. And a microphone that is only enabled when it's in use. This display is amazing. It's a 4K, 31.5 inch display, with wide color gamma HTR, UHD and anti-reflective coating. Basically, this thing looks incredible. (upbeat music) So, I've been using this computer for the past couple of few days and I absolutely love it. One of the things that I'm most excited about is this pop-up camera. I use this to do video calls, I also used it to due a test Stream. Everything all-in-one. Microphone, video. Am I live now? I need to move some stuff around in the background. I tried to hide it all. You guys are seeing it. Hold on a second. (notification music sounds) Oh what you all. That scared me! Now Streaming live. We've got our chat here, everyone's excited. And I haven't Streamed in a while, so they are probably like what are you doing, where are you? (laughs) (mellow music) This is now going to be a permanent part of our podcast set. We've been looking for a solution to be able to record our audio, have a screens that we would be able to see our notes and a way to bring in audio and video of our guests. So because this is able to be moved around, we have a little desk set up in front of our podcast desk. So I can have this set up at an actual desk when I'm doing work or playing games. And then just pick it up and move it in front of the podcast desk. It's so great because this Stream is so huge that we're able to see the screen, see our guests and I can actually hit record.
